p:
In an analogous manner to Example 111, 5-bromo-N-(2,3-dimethoxybenzyl)-8-hydroxy-1,6-naphthyridine-7-carboxamide (.1 g, .24 mmol) and sodium methanesulfinate (.057 g, .56 mmol) were reacted in 2 mL DMF to give N-(2,3-dimethoxybenzyl)-8-hydroxy-5-(methylsulfonyl)-1,6-naphthyridine-7-carboxamide trifluoroacetate salt.
1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400MHz) δ□D9.20 - 9.26 (2H, m); 8.35 (1H, m); 7.75 (1H, dd, J=4.2Hz, 8.7Hz); 7.06 (1H, t, J=7.9Hz); 6.91 - 6.97 (2H, m)4.72 (1H, d, J=6.2Hz); 3.97 (3H, s); 3.88 (3H, s); 3.45 (3H, s)
FAB HRMS exact mass calcd for C 19H 19N 3O 6S 418.1067 (MH +), found 418.1061
